title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Innovative Science Teacher Education Program Based on Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Science curriculum instruction experience and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Develop at least three types of science subject-specific customized assessment items using generative AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT)
Enhance physics/chemistry concept explanation capabilities by 20% through AI-based experimental simulation design

Learners can incorporate five core items from generative AI ethics guidelines (e.g., OECD AI Principles) to create a lesson operation plan for a corporate science education program (10+ sessions), achieving over 80% suitability in peer reviews and expert evaluations.
Design a learner feedback system using AI analysis tools in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
